declarations.description: Web component that enables you to lazy load an image based on screen size
declarations.name: LazyImgElement

cssProperties.name: --lazy-img-mq
cssProperties.description: Named media query identifier (set at :root level via media queries)

events.name: lazy-img:loaded
events.description: Dispatched when the image has been loaded

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Intrinsic width of the image (helps prevent layout shift)

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Intrinsic height of the image (helps prevent layout shift)

attributes.name: referrerpolicy
attributes.description: Referrer policy for the image request

attributes.name: min-inline-size
attributes.description: Minimum inline size (in pixels) to load the image

attributes.name: named-breakpoints
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of named breakpoints (reads from --lazy-img-mq CSS custom property)

attributes.name: view-range-start
attributes.description: When to load in view mode: "entry X%" for threshold or "entry -Xpx" for preload margin (default: "entry 0%")

attributes.name: loaded
attributes.description: Reflects whether the image has been loaded (read-only, set by component)

attributes.name: qualifies
attributes.description: Reflects whether element currently meets conditions to display (read-only, set by component, not used in view mode)
